name: BeatSmash - An EDM Experience
description:
(Note: Browser has worse performance and significantly downgraded textures.  For full experience, please download)

BeatSmash -  A difficult rhythm game inspired by the likes of Flash Flash Revolution and Thumper.   Dash through fantastical landscapes as you dodge, weave and smash to the beat.  But watch out... one wrong move can spell death!   Can you beat the second level?

I hope you enjoy, and I'd love to hear what you think.
